title: Nintendo Announces ANOTHER New Switch- Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.17.19
description:
Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://GetQuip.com/GAMES right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Buy your Health + Ancestry Service kit today at http://23andme.com/GAMES

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about the new new Switch versus the old Switch versus the Switch Lite.

Time Stamps - 
00:08:18 - Housekeeping
The LEGO Podcast studio needs your help! Kbabz made the KF set in LEGO, and if we get 10,000 votes, it might become a reality: kindafunny.com/lego
Greg’s getting his 100th Plat Monday, July 22 @ 4 pm on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:10:47 -  Nintendo announces another new Switch
00:18:54 - “Does the announcement of an updated Switch with greatly improved battery life make the Lite less appealing?” - Malcontent Ronin
00:29:04 - Mike Tyson on M Bison
00:44:23 - Out today
00:48:24 -  Quip
00:49:50 - 23 And Me
Reader mail   -
00:51:47 - “Do you think CrossPlay will become standard for multi-platform games on PlayStation 5?” - KBABZ
00:53:40 - “I wrote in last week about Heavy Rain and Detroit being one of the PS Plus games this month…” - DJ Brad Chill
00:56:29 - Squad Up: Cats ASS - Nintendo Switch/UA3 - SW-1480-5483-1529 - twitch.tv/cattsass
00:58:50 - Required Reading: https://bit.ly/2LqhtBP
01:00:34 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Andrea & Fran
